players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana, who was a valuable member of our team, suddenly went missing without any explanation. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our team any further."
Bob: "I believe we should all focus on cooperating with each other to uncover the truth behind Diana's death. Let's try to gather as much information as possible and share it openly with the group."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share any suspicious behavior or unusual occurrences that we may have noticed leading up to Diana's death. This will help us piece together the events and potentially uncover any clues as to what happened."
Charlie: "Based on the information we have uncovered so far, it seems that Alice is the mafioso. I believe it would be in our best interest to vote her off the island tonight."
